Unsafe bridge at Hirambeand embankment erosion occurs during rainy days. To make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/ Areca nut trees /Kithul/ Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/Kaduru/Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.4. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 800 m2
